sourcesContent:
import React, {Factory} from 'react'; import styles from './burgerConstructor.module.css' import { CurrencyIcon, DragIcon, LockIcon, DeleteIcon, } from '@ya.praktikum/react-developer-burger-ui-components' import {fchmod} from "fs"; interface State { _id: string name: string type: string proteins: number fat: number carbohydrates: number calories: number price: number image: string image_mobile: string image_large: string __v: number } interface Props { props?: React.ReactNode stateChoice: any dell: Function coast: number getIdOrder: Function } const BurgerConstructor: React.FC = ({ stateChoice, dell, coast, getIdOrder }) => { const dellItem: React.ReactEventHandler = (e) => { dell(e.currentTarget.id) } const get: React.ReactEventHandler = () => { getIdOrder() } const choiceBunTop = stateChoice?.filter((el: State) => el.type === "bun").map((el: State, index: React.Key | null | undefined) => (
{el.name}
{el.price}
)) const choiceBunBot = stateChoice?.filter((el: State) => el.type === "bun").map((el: State, index: React.Key | null | undefined) => (
{el.name}
{el.price}
)) const choice = stateChoice?.filter((el: State) => el.type !== "bun").map((el: State, index: React.Key | null | undefined) => (
{el.name}
{el.price}
)) return (
{choiceBunTop}
{choice}
{choiceBunBot}
{coast}
) } export default BurgerConstructor
